==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|い|かん|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
[[遺]] (い, ''i'': “leave”, "remain") + [[憾]] (かん, ''kan'': “regret")

===Adjectival noun===
{{ja-adj|decl=な|いかん}}

# feeling a [[regret]] that come from a failure of one's [[intention]]
# feeling a [[regret]] with [[pity]], [[sadness]], [[disappointment]], and [[shame]] because the result is not one's [[intention]] {{qualifier|often used in public addresses}}
#: {{ja-usex|その裁判は'''遺憾な'''結果に終わった。|その さいばん は '''いかん な''' けっか に おわった。|The judgment of the trial resulted in a '''regret'''.}}

====Inflection====
{{ja-na|いかん}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|いかん}}

# a [[regret]] that come from a failure of one's [[intention]]
# a [[regret]] with [[pity]], [[sadness]], [[disappointment]], and [[shame]] because the result is not one's [[intention]] {{qualifier|often used in public addresses}}
#: {{ja-usex|兵士の起こした犯罪について、国務長官は深い'''遺憾'''の意を表明した。|へいし の おこした はんざい に ついて、こくむ-ちょうかん は ふかい '''いかん'''-の-い を ひょうめい した。|Over a crime by the solder, Secretary of State apologized expressing deep '''regret'''.}}
